sources.title: The Bamboo Saucer
sources.description: Title: The Bamboo Saucer Summary: A flying saucer hidden in a Red Chinese peasant village is sought by teams from the United States and U.S.S.R. On finding it, they band together to explore the saucer and take a trip into ... Directed by: Frank Telford Actors: Dan Duryea, John Ericson, Lois Nettleton Production Company: National Telefilm Associates (NTA) Release Date: September 1974 (Turkey) Aspect Ratio: 1.85 : 1 A flying saucer hidden in a Red Chinese peasant village is sought by teams from the United States and U.S.S.R. On finding it, they band together to explore the saucer and take a trip into space.

metadata.Plot: A flying saucer hidden in a Red Chinese peasant village is sought by teams from the United States and U.S.S.R. On finding it, they band together to explore the saucer and take a trip into space.
metadata.Writer: Frank Telford, Alford Van Ronkel, John P. Fulton
metadata.Actors: Dan Duryea, John Ericson, Lois Nettleton
